summary: Two thugs from the Perth suburb of Midland catch the last train to Fremantle. When a young woman boards the train a few stops later, they begin talking and find out not everyone on the train is who they seem to be.
cast: Steve Le Marquand|Tom Budge|Gigi Edgley|Glenn Hazeldine|Gillian Jones|Lisa Hensley|Reg Cribb|Karli White
title: Last Train to Freo
